import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InvestmentForm=_ref=>{let{addInvestment}=_ref;const[crypto,setCrypto]=useState("BTC");const[amount,setAmount]=useState("");const[date,setDate]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(crypto&&amount>0&&date){addInvestment({crypto,amount:parseFloat(amount),date});setCrypto("BTC");setAmount("");setDate("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:crypto,onChange:e=>setCrypto(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"BTC",children:"Bitcoin (BTC)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"ETH",children:"Ethereum (ETH)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"ADA",children:"Cardano (ADA)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"SOL",children:"Solana (SOL)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),placeholder:"Monto",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"A\xF1adir Inversi\xF3n"})]});};export default InvestmentForm;
